Brand: Glossier

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Propanediol, Zinc PCA, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Extract, Citric Acid, Allantoin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Polysorbate 60, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate.

dium Phosphate.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
